title: Faculty Member Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Holy Innocents Episcopal School  (Atlanta, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process for faculty is a full-day affair with a series of meetings amongst higher-level staff (principal, AP, etc.), members of your department, the department chair, and potentially the chaplain .
Interview Questions: How do you know a student is actually learning?

title: Teacher, Secondary School Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Holy Innocents Episcopal School  (Atlanta, GA) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: First there was a phone interview. Then there was an in person interview where I gave a demo lesson. I met various staff and faculty members and they asked me about my previous experience.
Interview Questions: Talk about a challenging time when you were a student in high school. How has that impacted you?
